name: Маска для волос Schauma Питательный коктейль 3 в 1 380мл
ingredients: aqua (water, eau), cetearyl alcohol, glycerin, bis-(isostearoyl/oleoyl isopropyl) dimonium methosulfate, prunus amygdalus dulcis (sweet almond) oil, fragaria vesca (strawberry) fruit extract, betaine, isopropyl myristate, butyrospermum parkii (shea) butter, parfum (fragrance), sodium benzoate, behenamidopropyl dimethylamine, lactic acid, ceteareth-20, triethanolamine, benzyl alcohol, geraniol
